reviewText: All really great movies. "The Village" is alittle werider then the other two but still good. Creepy good. Great acting by all in all three.
Title: The Sixth Sense / Signs / The Village

reviewText: I loved all three movies, but I wish the collection had included "UNBREAKABLE", which I always regarded as sort of a sequel to "THE SIXTH SENSE" (but, maybe because I originally saw those two movies in that order).
Title: The Sixth Sense / Signs / The Village

Title: The Sixth Sense / Signs / The Village

reviewText: All three are great stories!!  I can't believe I was able to get ALL THREE in one shot!!  Well worth the $$$!!  Another good one of this director's work is "Unbreakable" with Bruce Willis in it, as well.  The only drawback with "Unbreakable" is that while overall the film is well paced, the ending seems rushed, as if another ten or fifteen minutes & they could have filled it out better,gaining It more meaning & punch.  But, back to these three-in-one, a great buy!!
Title: The Sixth Sense / Signs / The Village

reviewText: The seller didn't publish any details on this 3-pack, so I figured I'd try to help.This is based on my 3-pack, so I can't guarantee all are the same:You get 3 separate discs, one for each movie...all in the one case:The Sixth Sense:Widescreen; PG-13; Surround Sound/Dolby Digital; French Language track; Digitally Mastered; Canadian Rating: 14A;Region 1; *Signs:Widescreen; PG-13; Surround Sound/Dolby Digital; Digitally Mastered; THX-certified; Canada Rating: PG; French Language Track; Region: 1; *The Village:Widescreen; PG-13; THX-Certified including THX optimizer; Dolby Digital 5.1 EX Surround Sound; Enhanced for 16x9 TV; French Language Track; Canadian Rating: PG; Digitally Mastered; Region 1; *Concerning all 3 discs:*Some content on these discs may not be subtitled; some players may not be able to access all features; Dual-layer format: layer transition may trigger a slight pause.None of the ones I received were Blue-Ray.Personal note: I love The Sixth Sense and The Village (and Unbreakable, not included here) most of all Shyamalan films, but can recommend them all (including Devil, for which he just wrote the screenplay).  The thing I don't love is when sellers don't give you the info on what you're buying, which is far too common on Amazon.  Hope this helps!
Title: The Sixth Sense / Signs / The Village
